MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Function RefKindIsField (refKind As ReferenceKind) As Boolean
.method public static hidebysig bool RefKindIsField(valuetype Java.Lang.Invoke.ReferenceKind refKind) cil managed

remarks.para: This member is deprecated. This internal method was accidentally added to API 26 and must not be used. No replacement is available but it is possible to replicate using information from the table above, e.g. refKind >= 1 && refKind <= 4. There are no guarantees that this logic will work if future versions extend the table.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the #getReferenceKind reference kind part of the symbolic reference
the #getDeclaringClass declaring class part of the symbolic reference
the #getName member name part of the symbolic reference
the #getMethodType method type part of the symbolic reference
Docs.summary: Returns a string representation for a MethodHandleInfo, given the four parts of its symbolic reference.
Docs.returns: a string of the form "RK C.N:MT"

remarks.para: Returns a string representation for a MethodHandleInfo, given the four parts of its symbolic reference. This is defined to be of the form "RK C.N:MT", where RK is the #referenceKindToString reference kind string for kind, C is the java.lang.Class#getName name of defcN is the name, and MT is the type. These four values may be obtained from the #getReferenceKind reference kind, #getDeclaringClass declaring class, #getName member name, and #getMethodType method type of a MethodHandleInfo object.

format.a: Java documentation for java.lang.invoke.MethodHandleInfo.toString(int, java.lang.Class<?>, java.lang.String, java.lang.invoke.MethodType).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
